attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Respect Marriage and support Family Life.
Recognise a family is formed,in a loving relationship between a man and a women
If graced children will follow.
Support is required for a true family in this difficult age, credit is never given to the many whom soldier on, without a grumble while the headlines in our tabloids scream to destroy the very people whom are our bullwark of this great nation.
Our goverment must recognise children grow into adults, integrating into our communities.
The family can be a tool for the good if they are brought up with family values, defending the weak, improving peoples lives in everyday actions that respect and tolerate others.
Make the United Kingdom - Great once more - Support a man and women in marriage and the children born into the family.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
